metadata.title: CVE-2020-19725 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: There is a use-after-free vulnerability in file pdd_simplifier.cpp in Z3before 4.8.8. It occurs when the solver attempt to simplify the constraintsand causes unexpected memory access. It can cause segmentation faults orarbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: z3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
